In this lab called "Competitive", you will step into the shoes of a market researcher for an e-commerce company. Your task is to conduct a competitive analysis. 

You'll analyze key competitors and examine some market figures to identify any areas where your company could potentially gain a competitive advantage. Through this process, you'll gain practical experience in data analysis with SQL and Python, which is crucial in strategic decision-making.

::: {.callout-important}
Make sure you meet all the [pre](/requirements.qmd) for starting this lab
:::

::: {.callout-note}
## Technology we will use

- MySQL database
- SQL for data analysis
- Pandas for data analysis in Python
- Altair for data visualization in Python 

:::
